isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Source (Sleeper) With PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) With PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: If an accessory is plugged into the right auxiliary power source socket, power will flow from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AK, 14AW, fuse F10-C and circuit 14AY to right auxiliary power source socket. The ground path is circuits 11 - GAG, 11 - GBC, and 11 - GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454).
